text:
solution was to join BETA CRM Record Page Editor

<https://app.HubSpot.com/whats-new/43879154/betas>

Hello, I'm currently working with the Sprocket Rocket Theme, I'm trying to use a custom font called Proxima Nova, but is not in the HubSpot platform or in Google Fonts, can someone give me a hint about how can I set that custom font? Thanks in advance :grinning:

It looks like that font is a paid font through Adobe fonts. So you would have to use that. <https://helpx.adobe.com/fonts/using/add-fonts-website.html|https://helpx.adobe.com/fonts/using/add-fonts-website.html> OR you can find something close <https://www.learnui.design/blog/proxima-nova-similar-fonts.html|https://www.learnui.design/blog/proxima-nova-similar-fonts.html>
